name: Quadrilateral
description: A keyboard based window organizer for ChromeOS.

01-third-left.description: Thirds - Left: Resize and move window to the left third of the screen.

02-third-center.description: Thirds - Center: Resize and move window to the center third of the screen.

03-third-right.description: Thirds - Right: Resize and move window to the right third of the screen.

04-sixths-01.description: Sixths - Top Left: Resize and move window to the top left sixth of the screen.

05-sixths-02.description: Sixths - Top Center: Resize and move window to the top center sixth of the screen.

06-sixths-03.description: Sixths - Top Right: Resize and move window to the top right sixth of the screen.

07-sixths-04.description: Sixths - Bottom Left: Resize and move window to the bottom left sixth of the screen.

08-sixths-05.description: Sixths - Bottom Center: Resize and move window to the bottom center sixth of the screen.

09-sixths-06.description: Sixths - Bottom Right: Resize and move window to the bottom right sixth of the screen.

10-quarters-01.description: Quarters - Top Right: Resize and move window to the top right quarter of screen.

11-quarters-02.description: Quarters - Bottom Right: Resize and move window to the bottom right quarter of screen.

12-quarters-03.description: Quarters - Bottom Left: Resize and move window to the bottom left quarter of screen.

13-quarters-04.description: Quarters - Top Left: Resize and move window to the top left quarter of screen.

14-halves-01.description: Halves - Top: Resize and move window to the top half of screen.

15-halves-02.description: Halves - Bottom: Resize and move window to the bottom half of screen.

16-halves-03.description: Halves - Left: Resize and move window to the left half of screen.

17-halves-04.description: Halves - Right: Resize and move window to the right half of screen.
